divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving home when we saw a bright light hovering about 2-300 feet abovean open field. When we got close enough to make out a triangle shape it tookoff at extremely high speed heading south towards Klamath Falls
Summary: Three triangle shaped UFOs seen over the Klamath s
trends: There has been one other sighting in Chiloquin
There were no other sightings in Chiloquin on or around March 1st 2001
